intros l env_o. 
unfold NoDup, get_IR_input_keys, get_IR_input_keys, key in *. 
rewrite get_IR_input_keys_log_to_IR. 
intros x H. 
apply in_map_iff in H. 
destruct H as [e [H1 H2]]. 
rewrite H1. 
apply in_map_iff. 
exists e. 
simpl. 
rewrite H2. 
reflexivity. 
Qed.

original: intros l env_o. unfold NoDup, get_IR_input_keys, get_IR_input_keys, key in *. rewrite get_IR_input_keys_log_to_IR. intros x H. apply in_map_iff in H. destruct H as [e [H1 H2]]. rewrite H1. apply in_map_iff. exists e. simpl. rewrite H2. reflexivity.
